title: Nancy Pelosi Challenger Shahid Buttar Responds to Allegations
description:
California Congressional candidate Shahid Buttar, running to unseat Nancy Pelosi, shares his perspective on recent allegations of sexual and workplace misconduct. Matt and Katie break down the Massachusetts primary returns and Trump's Fox News interview with Laura Ingraham.

Merch Link: https://teespring.com/stores/useful-idiots
